entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HybridWebView: Support controlling F12 browser dev tools #22305
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView: Add support for JavaScript to invoke C# methods #22304
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView: Add support for C# to invoke JavaScript methods #22303
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView core features: static files and simple messages #22302
    .NET 9 Planning
  • IntelliSense for XAML is not working correctly in Visual Studio Code. #22301
  • In the project properties, the Custom Entitlements is missing .NET MAUI #22299
  • Strange behavior on MAUI WebAuthenticator for android #22296
  • Windows AppShell Title is overlaying on itself #22292
    Backlog
  • In Android, Property Changed not propagating to the view the FIRST time but ok every subsequent attempt #22291
    Backlog
  • InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls on Android #22289
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] Rotate the simulator and the page is truncated #22288
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Testing] Enable CarouselViewVirtualViewNotNull test on all platforms and fix related CarouselView issues #22287
    Backlog
  • The iOS keyboard is not fully retracted and requires an extra click on the “Done” button #22286
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Crash on Android when hold app over 2 minutes in background #22284

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] [iOS] [SDK 17] Touch events are not working on WebView when a PDF is displayed. #18716
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Mouse selection broken with the FluentUI package from MAUI > 8.0.7 #22297
  • [Windows] Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22000
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Windows] App crashes when rectangle sized by a Grid has a size of 1 on 125% scale screen #22003
    .NET 8 SR5
  • MediaStore query on Android returns 0 items with Android API 33 and 34. Generated manifest file in .NET 8 targets 29 although it should target 34 #22285
  • 8.0.21 update breaks android label wrap feature which causes other controls exceeding layout borders #22083
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Optimization can be disabled by setting the PublishTrimmed property to false. (NETSDK1144) (UNMC) #21999
  • Vertical Scrolling in ScrollView Orientation = "BOTH" is not working [Android] #22133

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert ios button changes #22300
    area/controls 🎮
  • Reuse/share the Button RippleDrawable logic with ImageButton #22298
    area/controls 🎮
  • Don't include removed projects #22294
    area/templates 📄

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview4] Update versions for preview4 #22293
  • Remove excess check in iOS input transparency checks #21883
  • [Windows] Avoid Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • Shape crash on 125% display size #22283
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/cat 😻
  • Don't push to maestro by default #22295
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [build] make `TrimMode=full` function like NativeAOT #22282
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area/collectionview 📃
  • fix: fix 22183 RadioButton checked value #22186
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • Trigger remeasure when constraints on CV changes #22270
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, Backlog
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, control-picker
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [UI Test] Update Appium to 5.0.0-rc.8 #22117
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
